comments.comment:
sneaky, great example why random testing rocks! I really wonder why this took so long to fail right there. here is a patch - kind of obvious what went wrong here.

Essentially, we don't release the "direct output" lock since the assignment to the flag marking the lock as taken is after the IO resource is accessed.

I plan to commit shortly
